articles.author: Alexandra Semenova
articles.title: S&P 500 Earnings Could Go From Bad to Even Worse in 2023, BofA Says - Bloomberg
articles.description: As Wall Street faces what’s set to be an ugly earnings season of deteriorating profits and weakening guidance, Bank of America Corp. strategists say the rest of 2023 could be even worse.
articles.content:
As Wall Street faces what’s set to be an ugly earnings season of deteriorating profits and weakening guidance, Bank of America Corp. strategists say the rest of 2023 could be even worse.
